pJointPointOnLine Class Reference
[Joints]

A point on line joint constrains a point on one actor to only move along a line attached to another actor. The point attached to the line is the anchor point for the joint. The line through this point is specified by its direction (axis) vector. More...

Inherits pJoint.

    Enables collision between both bodies.

Detailed Description

A point on line joint constrains a point on one actor to only move along a line attached to another actor. The point attached to the line is the anchor point for the joint. The line through this point is specified by its direction (axis) vector.

DOFs removed: 2
DOFs remaining: 4

See also:
pFactory::createPointInPlaneJoint()
